page.title: 05RECREATION
page.content: The centre was opened 1976. In the main gym all kinds of ball games, parties, shows, discos and roller skating take place. In the small gym we can play table tennis, trampoline acrobatics,do weight training or practise mountaineering on the climbing wall. There are 4 squash courts which are always in use. Keepfit clubs and saunas are very popular. The large swimming pool is used for school swimming lessons and is open to the public outside school hours. A cafe and bar are open for refreshment. Many facilities are free to the unemployed and anyone can have a lot of fun at little cost. We are proud of our centre.
